nodes.text: Nica Leross was a female Force-sensitive Human. Following the Battle of Asylum she travelled to Odessen and joined the Alliance against the Eternal Empire of Zakuul. She was assigned to the military branch of the Alliance under former Galactic Republic Admiral Bey'wan Aygo.
Nica Leross appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire expansion as a Sith Warrior vendor inside Odessen base.
